name: Consistent Care Services- COVID Vaccine Site
address: 1235 North Post St. Suite 201, Spokane WA, 99205
vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info:
***This is a clinic for 1st or 2nd doses of the Pfizer or Moderna COVID-19 vaccine or the single dose of the Johnson & Johnson*** All patients 12 years old and older can register for the Pfizer vaccine only. (If 12-17 years old for the Pfizer vaccine, you must be with a parent or guardian or have parental/guardian consent) Vaccinations at the Consistent Care Services COVID Vaccine Clinic are by appointment only. The clinic is located at 1235 N. Post St., Spokane WA 99201. The clinic is located upstairs in suite 201. There is elevator access or stairs. 
***Residents of ANY state are now eligible for the vaccine, but you still must have photo ID***
***Parking is free on the West side of the building only in stalls 14-55. Please do not come to your appointment if you are sick*** 
***Please no outside food or drinks***  
*VERY IMPORTANT*
***Please complete all the insurance/Medicare/Medicaid information when registering online for your appointment to avoid filling it out at the clinic***
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Yakima County Health District COVID Vaccination Site
info: ***1ST & 2nd DOSE PFIZER VACCINATIONS!!!!*** The vaccination clinic will take place at Selah Civic Center. This clinic will be outside. Masks are required. Please wear clothing which allows access to your shoulder. All individuals 12 and over are eligible to get vaccinated. Those under 18 must be accompanied by a parent/guardian or must get parental consent via video/phone call or paper format. Informacion Adicional: ***VACUNAS DE PRIMERA Y SEGUNDA DOSIS PFIZER!!!*** La clínica de vacunación se ubicara en Selah Civic Center. Se requieren máscaras. Por favor, use ropa que permita acceso a su brazo. Todas las personas mayores de 12 años son elegibles para vacunarse. Los menores de 18 años deben estar acompañados por un padre/tutor o deben obtener el consentimiento de los padres por video/llamada telefónica o en papel.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Walla Walla Mobile Units
vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info:
This clinic will be held on the Walla Walla Community College campus at the Student Rec Center. The clinic will offer PFIZER VACCINATIONS for all qualifying individuals aged 12 years & over. Parental/Guardian consent is required for 12 – 17 year olds, parent/guardian consent and signature can be completed on-site or in the final screen of the online registration process. 
Appointments are recommended but Walk-ins are welcome!
Masks are required. If you do not have a mask, one will be provided.
We look forward to seeing you. Thanks for keeping Walla Walla well.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Pliable Mobile Clinic
address: Recovery Cafe | 2022 Boren Ave, Seattle WA, 98121
vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info:
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************

Hello! We warmly welcome you to Pliable’s mobile COVID-19 vaccination clinic hosted at the Recovery Cafe (South Lake Union) on Thursday, July 15th **********************************************************************************************************************************************************

This vaccination event is administering the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine (1st or 2nd doses!) , Moderna (1st or 2nd doses!), and Johnson&Johnson. 

Pfizer and Moderna are a two-dose vaccination series.
If you have had your 1st dose, please bring your CDC vaccination card with you to your 2nd-dose appointment.
 **********************************************************************************************************************************************************
Pliable LLC is a nurse practitioner-led organization for mindfully-driven healthcare. In alignment with Washington State Department of Health’s (DOH) equitable COVID-19 vaccine distribution strategies, our goal is to equitably and compassionately serve those communities disproportionately impacted by COVID-19 and help fill in vaccine access gaps. 
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
Please read the CDC and WA DOH information regarding COVID-19 Vaccinations and have your questions answered BEFORE REGISTERING. Resources can be found at: https://www.doh.wa.gov/Emergencies/COVID19/Vaccine https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/info-by-product/pfizer/pfizer-bioNTech-faqs.html 
https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/info-by-product/janssen/index.html
.
The Fact Sheet for Pfizer vaccination can be found at: https://www.fda.gov/media/144414/download 

The Fact Sheet for Moderna vaccination:
https://www.fda.gov/media/144638/download

The Fact Sheet for Johnson and Johnson vaccination can be found at: 
https://www.fda.gov/media/146305/download

The American Academy of Pediatrics’ Endorsement & Facts can be found at: https://www.aappublications.org/news/2021/05/12/cdc-aap-pfizer-covid-vaccine-teens-051221.
.
You/Legal Guardian should have accessed and read the EUA fact sheet prior to registering. 
.
For resources on side effects and post vaccination expectations: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/expect/after.html 
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
By proceeding and scheduling online you are consenting to the following terms below as the patient or surrogate decision maker for the patient, including minors. 
• I certify that I am /my child is at least 12 years of age. 12 years+ (for Pfizer) or 18+ for Moderna and Johnson & Johnson
• I understand it is not possible to predict all possible side effects or complications associated with receiving the COVID-19 Pfizer, Moderna, or Johnson&Johnson vaccine. 
• I understand the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has authorized the emergency use of this vaccine, which is not an FDA approved vaccine in this patient population. I understand the nature, alternatives, benefits and risks of vaccination, to the extent they are known at this time. 
• I am encouraged to sign up with v-safe: https://vsafe.cdc.gov/ 
• I acknowledge that I have been advised to remain near the vaccination location for observation for 15 minutes after administration, 30 mins if I have a prior history of allergic reactions to vaccines. 
• I give my consent to Pliable LLC, including licensed employees, volunteers, and partners, to administer the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine , Moderna COVID-19 vaccine , OR Johnson&Johnson COVID-19 vaccine as described above. Neither these entities or our host facilities/business can be held liable for adverse outcomes
• PREP Act Authorization for CDC COVID-19 Vaccination Program 
Governor Jay Inslee’s Proclamation by the Governor 20-05, issued on February 29, 2020 and subsequently amended, is a Declaration of Emergency. Covered Persons include, among others, any person authorized in accordance with the public health and medical emergency response of the Authority Having Jurisdiction to prescribe, administer, deliver, distribute or dispense the Covered Countermeasures, program planners, and their officials, agents, employees, contractors and volunteers, following a Declaration of Emergency.
https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2020-03-17/pdf/2020-05484.pdf
• I authorize and understand Pliable LLC may be required to or may voluntarily disclose my vaccine-related health information to my insurance plan, state or federal registries, and/or other public health authorities, for purposes of payment or health care operations. 
• I understand that I am not creating a patient relationship with Pliable LLC by participating in vaccination. I understand Pliable LLC is not acting as my medical provider. Vaccination does not replace treatment by my medical provider. I agree I will seek medical advice, care and treatment from a medical provider if I have questions or concerns, or if I experience side effects. 
• I have been provided expectations for the day of my vaccination.
• I acknowledge that I have read the vaccine Fact Sheet and agree to these terms and conditions. 
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************

This registration and attestation serves as consent.  No additional written consent is required

**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
On the day of your appointment: 
• Vaccination is available regardless of your citizenship or immigration status. 
• If you have insurance, please include this information during your online registration. Insurance is NOT required, you will not be billed, the vaccination is FREE TO ALL. Insurance will cover administrative costs if available. 
• Wear a short-sleeved shirt or clothing that allows access to your upper arm.  
• Masks are required at all times at the clinic. If you do not have a mask one will be provided to you. 
• Please arrive no earlier than 10 minutes prior to your scheduled appointment time. Appointment cannot be guaranteed if you arrive late. 
• Do not visit the site if you are experiencing symptoms of COVID-19 on the day of your appointment. 
• If you have a history of serious allergic reactions (anaphylaxis) and are prescribed an epinephrine auto injector (Epipen, etc) please bring this to your vaccination appointment and notify clinical staff. 
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
HAPPY VACCINATION DAY!
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
www.bepliable.com
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Yakima Community Vaccine Center
info: ***PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE PFIZER!!! Enter fairgrounds through Gate 15 off of Pacific Avenue. Be prepared to show confirmation of your appointment or you may experience a slightly longer wait. Masks are required. Please wear clothing which allows access to your shoulder. Vaccinations at this site are reserved for people who live and/or work in Washington State. All Minors age 17 and Under must be accompanied by a parent. Ingresar por la puerta 15 en la avenida Pacífico. Se requieren máscaras. Por favor, use ropa que permita acceso a su brazo. Las vacunas en este sitio están reservadas para las personas que viven o trabajan en el estado de Washington. Todos los menores de 17 años o menos deben ir con su padres.*** PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE PFIZER!!!
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Care-A-Van Radio Station KBLD
info: This clinic is located at Kent Station. This is a walk-up location. Please let us know if you or someone you are accompanying needs assistance of any kind. **You should also plan your visit around waiting for 15 minutes in the observation area so we can monitor for any unlikely adverse reactions to the vaccine.** Certain people with pre-identified conditions or past anaphylaxis events may be asked to wait for 30 minutes of observation. Free language translation services are provided. Video ASL translation is also provided. Please do not come if you are feeling ill.  It is best to wear clothes that will allow for access to your upper arm, just below the shoulder. **Masks are still required. If you do not have a mask, one will be provided.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Thurston County Public Health Medical Reserve Corp
address: Capital Mall - 625 Black Lake Boulevard Southwest, Olympia WA, 98502
info: This is a single-dose Johnson & Johnson clinic being held at Capital Mall, 625 Black Lake Blvd SW, Olympia WA, 98502 for anyone age 18 and older from 12pm-8pm.  We will be located inside the mall, closest to the Sephora end of the mall and next to the Buckle store. Please bring a form of identification with you to your appointment - ID card, passport, or other document with your name and birthday on it. • Wear a short-sleeved shirt, but dress with layers, if needed. • Waiting at least 15 minutes after vaccination is required.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
